mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_description, i.item_deleted, i.item_owner_id AS user_id, u.name AS user_name FROM items AS i LEFT JOIN users AS u ON i.item_owner_id = u.id WHERE i.item_deleted = false and i.item_id= #{id}

mapper.update: UPDATE items SET item_name = #{name}, item_price = #{price}, item_description = #{description}, item_deleted = #{deleted}, item_owner_id = #{ownerId} WHERE item_id = #{id}
